title: 'Nice but too soft'
body: 'It’s nice but too soft. Makes you want to use both pillows at the same time. A little more filling might have made this a better product. When u press it down your hand goes right thru. Okay product for someone with neck problems.'

title: 'Comfort and quality'
body: '"These pillows are a must-have for anyone seeking comfort and quality. The down alternative filling feels just like real down but without the allergies. The soft fabric is gentle on the skin and the grey cord piping adds a touch of elegance. Washing them is a breeze!"'

title: 'Soft and plush
rating: best pillow I have ever used'
body: '5.0 out of 5 stars''I have been on lookout for a good pillow for ages now. I toss and turn a lot in sleep so the pillow must be good on back and side. I felt like my neck pain wont subside and wont ever get a comfortable sleep. I have tried the traditional cotton filled pillow recron filled buckwheat pillow (for better neck support) memory foam but my search ends here.I prefer this firmness. I am yet to see how they turn up after a wash. Will change rating if they turn lumpy after wash.  Ok folks here is the verdict on post wash condition. the description is correct. i had to wash mine because of a spill. the pillow does not lose its bounce and remains as is. so go for it'

title: 'Comfy pillows'

title: 'Awesome purchase'
body: I couldn't be happier with my purchase of the Microfiber Pillows. If you're seeking a comfortable, supportive, and hypoallergenic pillow option, I highly recommend giving these pillows a try. My sleep quality has improved significantly, and I can't imagine going back to regular pillows after experiencing the comfort of these microfiber wonders!

title: Don't buy anything from pepperfry
body: I bought one pair of pillows. They sent me the worst-quality product, and as I did complain about this, I was told that if I had gotten a defective product, then they would accept a return or replacement and denied my request. hence i request to all don't buy from pepperfry.

title: 'Quality not up to the price one pays for the Pillow.'
body: 'The pillows are not worth the price one pays for each. The fill material is not sufficient and just after a couple of uses it flattens out. I would not buy AGAIN.'

title: 'Uncomfortable'

title: 'Very soft and not matching the description'
body: 'I had ordered firm plush pillow however the ones I received were very soft and my head sunk in when used. The pillows are very soft and do not offer any support to the neck. Returning it ASAP.'

title: 'Best in the market … must buy'
body: 'Pillows are pretty good and large too as I have shown in the video and picture just keeping it on bed seems so cool just keeping an arm on the pillow while sleeping feels cosy n get a wonderful sleep I use my normal pillows to sleep at night and use these as head rest on bed during the day sometimes I use these too for sleeping depends on my mood I recommended these to some of my relatives too. Good product. Everything upto the mark. Full customer satisfaction.'

title: 'Surprisingly comfortable and good value'
body: I bought these to replace another old pair of pillows and I'm very happy with how comfortable they are, for the price. No fancy memory foam stuff but they get the job done and I've been sleeping well, which is all I can ask for, really.
